本期角色为沙耶香和塞拉斯

原图来自X@masakinariya
瞄准具是基于@竹内初奈Official 在原图基础上创作的线稿绘制而来
第一次发布的时候标注了错误了来源非常抱歉
未经允许禁止使用本瞄具代码进行二次创作！！！！！

实际上就是默认瞄准具加了个角色图案））））））

【Hasu no Sora❁War Thunder】The first issue of the original land sight beautification
The roles in this issue are Murano Sayaka and Ceras Yanagida Lilienfeld

The original image is from X@masakinariya
The sight is based on a line drawing created by @竹内初奈Official based on the original drawing

自行火炮瞄具(SPG Sight) : FW3_SPG_A1
通用瞄具-A系列 (Universal - A)

适配倍率（Zoom of sight） : #m109 #2s1 #2s3m #plz83
4.0x
3.7x - 5.5x
4.1x - 8.0x

使用方法 : 已整合进压缩包内
Instructions : Inside the compressed file

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面。
用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

陶车瞄具(TOW Sight) : FW3_ATGM_A1
通用瞄具-A系列 (Universal - A) : 来自战地2-反坦克火箭筒
From the battlefield2 Anti-Tank

适配倍率（Zoom of sight） : #m901 #rakjpz_2_hot #wiesel_tow #cm25 #aft09
4.0x - 8.0x
3.0x - 12.0x
3.0x - 13.0x

使用方法 : 已整合进压缩包内
Instructions : Inside the compressed file

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面。
用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

Су-27УБ Фланкер С
Su-27UB Flanker C

second sight I made (technically third but the second one failed)

this was pain but the end result was pretty worth it

if it doesn't work, then:

1: find war thunder in your steam library
2: right-click the war thunder game tab and go to "manage --> browse local files"
3: navigate to your "UserSights" folder
4: create a new folder (unless you already have one) and rename it to include the country of origin and the name of the tank (ex. ussr_t_72m2_moderna | germ_marder_1a1), then open that folder, insert the sight and type at the beginning: "s...
